title: Asking For Clear Skies
description: Authentic supplications for Asking For Clear Skies
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Asking For Clear Skies. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 174
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ حَوَالَيْنَا وَلاَ عَلَيْنَا، اللَّهُمَّ عَلَى الآكَامِ وَالظِّرَابِ، وَبُطُونِ الْأَوْدِيَةِ، وَمَنَابِتِ الشَّجَرِ)).
